title: Joint account possible ...or no??
text: Customer service was stellar, however, we were expecting to be set up with a joint account (two names) and I was the only one on it. I think we figured it out though.

title: My expérience credit union I discovered…
text: My expérience credit union I discovered how à financial institution can genuinely for it's membres by offering personalized services that meet or unique needs

title: Too many people to work through
text: I had two orders of business to take care of. The first could be handled by one person but couldn’t take care of my other without going to another. I was told there were two individuals that could help but the first one who was freed up didn’t help. I had to wait for the other person to get finished with the member before getting finalizing my business.

title: DuGood has always been good people to…
text: DuGood has always been good people to deal with; professional and polite, as well as, kind.  When I had to close my account and open a new one - the only negative comment I can make is they didn't tell me the suffix for ACH payments (for my bills) had been changed from 010 to 009; therefore, when I changed all my payment methods, I used what I had always used - 010 and my bill payments got returned.  Then when they set up my three accounts to transfer between them - they didn't tell me that you have to click a tab called "Move Money".  In the past I have always seen all the different accounts on the same page as the checking and savings, loans, etc.  So - they need to include those two pieces of information - especially with long established customers.  It took getting in touch with the lady over the digital dept. to tell me when it should have been customer service.  Otherwise, everything was great and I thank you all.

title: What do you want me  to say  to people…

title: The only complaint I have is the choice…
text: The only complaint I have is the choice of music playing overhead. I believe it was Christian rock/pop. I don't understand why something so personal such as religious belief was necessary for my experience. It had me wondering if the company was limited in its inclusion based on religion or possibly even other factors.Otherwise, my experience was great.

title: All stuff are careful taking care the…
text: All stuff are careful taking care the business and customer needs.but it make so hard  to get approve that make me feels doesn’t want to do it anymore .to do any loan in future.I do thank you just to save me this once. I won’t do it again.

text: Ashanti (I hope I spelled her name right) was so helpful, patient and accommodating. I am new to the bank and my experience so far has been great.

title: Waiting time
text: The customer service was okay but I was waiting in line for quite awhile and I think they should have more workers or be quicker!

text: Very friendly and very understanding about everything..Heard a lot about credit unions but never had the chance to join one thanks for everything!!!

text: Everyone was friendly and spoke up to say Hi when I came in.  I returned the next day and the lady who had taken care of me was able to speak with me again.  She quickly looked something up for me and I was on my way.

title: DuGood Credit Union provides…
text: DuGood Credit Union provides competitive rates, simple online banking, and personalized service that has genuinely improved my financial situation. I strongly recommend DuGood Credit Union to anyone seeking for a trustworthy and dependable banking partner who prioritizes its members.

title: Customer Service
text: First of all friendly,attentive, polite and very knowledgeable , I was impressed by my experience, and will recommend Dugood to other's.

title: The person I dealt with was nice and…
text: The person I dealt with was nice and courteous. The problem I have is with the signing into my account. I get errors about my Id, password, recognizing my device that I'm accessing my account. I have to do too much of maintenance to keep me able to.login. I put the right I'd in and it says it does not recognize it. I retype the exact same thing and it goes through.

title: The questions were well asked
text: The questions were well asked, no complaints from me.

title: Quick service and a big help
text: Quick service and a big help.  Responded to my inquires quickly with candor and professionalism.  Wait time on call queue is a bit long when dialing the main line but direct lines to employees (if you know their ext) is always fast.

title: Quick& precise loan process
text: Date of experience: November 20, 2023

title: Great Staff and Helpful Service
text: Date of experience: September 01, 2023

title: Dugood is a great Credit Union to use…
text: Dugood is a great Credit Union to use for--

title: Take too long to clear online banking
text: Take too long to clear a check before letting me set up my online banking. I wanted to move money from MN credit union but had to wait 9 days - then 2 more days to get account setup.  Seems like everything I did required a day or so to be approved.  Suggestion: Let me setup online banking immediately - just disallow withdrawals until the 9 days are complete -- would have allowed me to get everything in place and move money into the account much quicker. Hopefully when I set up Bill Pay and other features I don't have to wait again.

title: Opening a new account
text: I was able to open and confirm my account via the phone. This made it quick and easy. I spoke with Audrey at DuGood and she was extremely helpful. I am looking forward to utilizing my account with DuGood!

title: Very nice and respectful.
text: Date of experience: August 04, 2023

title: Very friendly and efficient
text: Date of experience: April 26, 2023

title: Effective use of technology to execute loan process
text: Team did a great job with processing the loan (start to finish) using email, phone, and online application portal. Improvement opportunity: Slow down and clarify the home equity loan expectation and requirements. Use email instead of overloading the conversation on the phone. Use email to compliment the phone conversation.

title: Dugood FCU is there for me in hard…
text: Dugood FCU is there for me in hard times and good times. Loan department is very knowledgeable about loan information. Representatives are very polite and don’t waste time with services. Dugood should consider expanding their great business. Keep up the good work.

title: Dugood had been top line banking for…
text: Dugood had been top line banking for me. any time i need move money or do a wire or even a loan they are helpful walk me thru it all and make sure i understand and want to do whatever it is im doing.the jasper office is very friendly and helpful.all the staff there are ready to help with warm smiles on their faces.they are a unique group thank u dugood

title: Employee was VERY helpful
text: Employee was VERY helpful.  I am sure she was doing her job as trained.  Just seemed a little "overboard" with some of the requirements needed to complete our business.  I am sure it is "this" credit union's policy, but since we have been a customer in good standing for so many years, with multiple accounts: loans, savings, checking, businesses, that ,maybe, some of the "norms" could have been more flexible.

title: DuGood Credit Union is the Best of the…
text: DuGood Credit Union is the Best of the Best!!  Always helpful and friendly.  My only reason for not giving 5 STARS is the fact that DuPont Credit Union was smaller and was a big family and DuGood is so large it isn't often that you know everybody there nor do they know you personally.  Thank You for Brenda Franks who is our "go to" for help.  She is the "Old School" family & friend!!!  She goes WAY ABOVE and BEYOND!!!

title: Fix 2 issues, then everything would be great
text: I don't like the fact that the Major Drive location doesn't open the inside on Saturday. Safety Box access on the weekend is needed. Improvements have been made to the online system which helped a lot. One more improvement is still needed which is the ability to modify the date on reoccurring bill pay for a series change . Only the amount can be changed. All can be changed for one time.

title: "A" Rating
text: The only thing I've ever been disappointed in DuGood about was their inability to handle the extra work load involved after Hurricane Harvey. My insurance company contacted them TWICE to initiate pay off of my auto loan & they were "too busy" to call me & let me know they needed my permission before responding. Otherwise, they've always been very polite, efficient & timely.

title: Business Lending sucks,  normal banking great
text: i’ve tried to get in touch with and set up a meeting with the business lending department for months now, and am never able to talk with anyone except the branch manager. No returned calls or messages.   that being said,  each experience walking into the branch has always been very pleasant .  I’m always greeted by a friendly and welcoming staff  tellers are always  competent.

title: Update your mobile app
text: I am completely happy with the customer service experience but am somewhat disappointed in the payment methods for auto loans.  It needs to be a simple method as other financial institutions have a pay now button on their app that directly takes from the checking account.  I can only give a 4 star rating and hopefully changes will be made to make it not a hassle to pay DuGood money owed

title: The New 24 Hour Hold Policy is A Major Inconvenience
text: The new policy that doesn't allow me to access my funds until 24 hours after they are transferred from my direct deposit from my social security is very inconvenient and causes a hardship for me.  I hope that DuGood will consider reinstating the old policy.  The 24 hour hold makes things difficult for me, and I'm sure that it's the same for other of your clients as well.Other than that, I really do love doing business with DuGood.

title: Loan process is fairly strightforward
text: Loan process is fairly strightforward. The extra costs per month are unexpected. insurance fees and changes in interest rates.Statements are needed more frequently to track re-payment plan. They are not as competitave on interest rated as other credit unions. Otherwise they are a decent organizatiuon that provides a service better than commercial banks.

title: Great experience
text: Had a great loan officer helped me out a lot and was very polite and professional, fast service, overall awesome experience. Good and fair rates. Only thing i didnt like is that i could only get financed for 36 months due to the age of the truck. I find that a little ridiculous but everywhere was like that.

title: Recently refinanced our home
text: Recently refinanced our home and consolidated other debts. This was all done online and a few phone calls. My loan officer(Ms. Reynolds) was extremely helpful, considerate, and a joy to work with. She made the process very painless by alleiving my fears of the loan process and making it easy to do. I would never hesitate to recommend Dugood CU to any of my friends or family, even your regular banking people are a joy to work with. Keep up the great work!!!

title: I've been with DuPont for a number of…
text: I've been with DuPont for a number of years. I have recommended DuPont to my children. I have problems from time to time with on line banking but I'm quite a bit older than my children. My children tell me that Mobil Oil FCU is easer to use. I do not know about this but I do know the problems I have from time to time at DuPont. I'm not going any ware, I have My account and seven grand children's accounts that I track monthly as I help them to watch their money grow.Thank You

title: Excellent
text: Excellent, friendly and professional. Service is swift and atmosphere was calm and welcoming.  The only problem I've had is checking my balance.     Thank you DuGood      Michael Edmond Swisher      Satisfied Customer

title: Best credit union or bank I have ever …
text: Best credit union or bank I have ever been with. Professionally run but with a small town heart. Courteous and prompt. My suggestion is, drive-thru tends at times to be slower than going inside, but as I am handicapped, it's still worth the wait for the smile and the thank you.Russell E. Proctor

title: Don’t like the fact when I bring in…Cashier checks
text: Don’t like the fact when I bring in cashiers checks from another credit union in town Every month get treated like I am bringing in fake ones. You may have suspect members that do that but as long as we have been members and the fact we have cd’s already with y’all. It’s annoying.

title: All was smooth and easy
text: All was smooth and easy.  My only complaint was I had to leave work because I was told I had to sign papers at one of your locations. When I got to the location to sign the papers they told me I didn’t have to sign the papers. That process could be improved somehow.

title: Customer Service
text: The customer service rep at the DuGood CU Edison Plaza was wonderful. She made our experience (my wife and I)well worth the time and effort. She treated us with the utmost respect and that goes a long way as to whether or not customers keep coming back.

title: I am having a very hard time enrolling…
text: I am having a very hard time enrolling in online banking and trying to enroll in the app.It states something I entered in registering is incorrect but there isn't anything incorrect. I am unabe to leave my job to get someone to help me. Its frustrating.

title: Anavel was a great help and was very…
text: Anavel was a great help and was very considerate of my situation. No matter what has happened to me in the past, they take the time to ask question pertaining to me, it’s nice to feel like your are someone and not just another customer!

title: They make you feel like a priority.
text: Very awesome people who will try their hardest to meet all your needs, along with trying to make any issues you may have a priority to fix. Overall a great credit union and I always recommend them to anyone who is searching for their 'home bank'

title: they do work with you
text: they do work with you. just not what you go in to  get. we went in to ask for a certain amount on a loan we knew we could afford. but  was offered less, so  something is better than nothing to help balance your budget better

title: Products? Great! Fees? Not so much!
text: I have been with DuGood  for 11 years now. Every time I have banking needs they are quick to accommodate and assist and the products offered are wonderful. My biggest qualm  is specifically with the service charges that are associated to some of the conveniences they offer such as debit card replacement, account research, and fraudulent claim filing. I’ve considered moving my assets elsewhere on the principal of how inconvenient the fees are in addition to a less than ideal situation such as experiencing fraud on an account, however their flexible credit products and deposit interest rates have provided enough value to remain a client.

title: Almost painless
text: Almost painless.  My loan officer was very kind, understanding, then quickly worked to determine how she might help me. I had her full attention, until my business was completed. I felt quit comfortable as I was walked thru the process.

title: Okay interactions
text: The few interactions I had with the office representatives were dry and not warm but helpful, the drive up employees are helpful and warm. Overall, my experience has been okay. My interactions do not reflect my opinions of Dugood overall.

title: New Account Set Up
text: The lady that set up our account was very knowledgeable about the products and services that DuGood offer. She answered all of our questions. We are very satisfied with the service she provided in getting our account open.

title: Lunch time matters
text: Went in around noonish, there was only one teller taking care of drive thru & lobby. I would think between 11 & 1 there would be more than just one teller.  Still it was better than my experience at another local bank.

title: DuGood has always treated me very good
text: DuGood has always treated me very good, they have been very helpful in financing and loaning me the money at a very good rate. Always have treated me with respect, thank you DuGood.SincerelyBarry Uptigrove

title: Overall the credit union is great.The …
text: Overall the credit union is great.The only thing I disapprove of is the term limits on share loans A member should have an option on the amount of time of a share loan since the money is held for collateral.

text: Quick and helpful
